short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extracto.bot is a no-configuration, intelligent web scraper. Use Google Sheets and AI to automagically collect data from any site.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Dead simple. Instant. Intelligent.
Extracto.bot was designed to disappear into the background and help you get more done, faster, with less mental overhead.

No configuration necessary
Get scraping in seconds: Enter the fields you want to collect as columns in Google Sheets, goto the website, and click "extract."

Built around Google Sheets
Extracto.bot is built around the world's most powerful spreadsheeting and organization app. Enjoy the benefits of the Google Drive ecosystem.

CMD+SHIFT+E
Extracto.bot is built with hundreds of smart, time saving features designed to save you time, energy, and mental overhead.

Sales prospects
Instantly collect relevant sales prospecting data from LinkedIn, Facebook, or directly on company websites.

Comparison shopping
Cut through the noise of every different online store and collect only the data you want. Leverage the power of Google Sheets to share and compare.

Home purchase
Stay organized while looking for your next home purchase. Instantly save only the data you want, from any listing site, instantly.
